definition: having two faces--one looking to the future and one to the past
details:
adjective
- having two faces--one looking to the future and one to the past
= example: having two faces--one looking to the future and one to the past
= synonyms: Janus-faced
- marked by deliberate deceptiveness especially by pretending one set of feelings and acting under the influence of another
= synonyms: Janus-faced
